title: r/Maliciouscompliance "If You Don't Like it... Quit!" "ok bye"
description: r/Maliciouscompliance When OP was a minor, he worked at a cafe making a decent wage. He was supposed to get a government-mandated pay increase when he turned 18, but his boss said "oh no, the wage increase is discretionary." So, OP quit without turning in his two week's notice. When the boss complained, OP said "oh no, my 2 week notice is discretionary."
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
